Jyh-Miin Lin Modern Doctor in Quest of Science

Jyh-Miin Lin

Qualification

  1. PhD Student at University of Cambridge, Department of Radiology

  2. MS, Department of Electrical Engineering(Now it is renamed as Graduate Institute of Biomedical Electronics and Bioinformatics)

  3. MD, Department of Medicine, National Taiwan University
